pullRequest.title: [nikobus] rollershutter position estimator added
pullRequest.bodyText:
Nikobus rollershuter module does not provide information about rollershutter's position - to make this play better in OH, an additional parameter per channel was introduced to allow estimation of rollershutter's position.
Signed-off-by: Boris Krivonog boris.krivonog@inova.si

beforeCommit.message:

Signed-off-by: Boris Krivonog <boris.krivonog@inova.si>

afterCommit.message:
